EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
For After School Activities (ASA) this term, we are using an online sign up system whereby you will sign up for your child’s choice of ASA.
The online sign up system will be available from 6pm Thursday 9th January
Please only sign up for 1 ASA on a Tuesday and 1 ASA on a Thursday making sure the ASA is specifically for your aged child. If your child is training for a school sports team or in the Rainbows or Brownies then they don’t need to sign up for another ASA on that day.
If the ASA is already filled up, you will be informed immediately and will then have the option to sign up for a second choice.
Once a student is signed up to an ASA, I expect them to commit to that ASA all term and there will be no option to change to another ASA.
Early Years children who get the bus and need to wait for their sibling can join our creche. There are a limited number of paid ASAs available for Reception age.
For detailed descriptions of the ASAs, please click on the link below to go to the information booklet:
Primary ASA Guide (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SWY/e2oe59ZzRKvnsLSztk6EWHfvn_YHG0ouyX_8pOXVZYM=)
To sign up for an ASA, please follow the below link:
Primary ASA Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1KatcKY_MalHVw29IDRG81IG2Nm_65ckEyolHIH2-2w4/viewform)
(Registration will only be opened at 6PM, Thursday, 9th January.)
If you have any difficulties signing up please send an email to asa.registration@britishschool.edu.my
Warm regards
Janet Brock Headteacher The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
